about_the_game:
Story


Since medieval times, people searched for knowledge and power facing the uncertainty of the world. Maera was one of those, she found connections to other worlds, the demon world. As she researched and studied more and more, she became connected to the demons and it was just a matter of time until she learned how to harvest the demon's powers, using the pact. Pact is a contract between the demon and the human where the demon lends its powers to the human in trade for something else, for them it was the possibility to leave the demon world, so Maera became the first ever witch.

The more pacts she made, the stronger she became and in no time she was already ruling the world and spreading demons and chaos. The world entered a dark era and Maera just kept growing stronger and stronger. To fight this darkness a new cult was created from people who were learning to harvest magic from another source, the nature. These were the new witches, and using nature's power instead of pacts.

A vicious war started between Maera and the nature witches. Maera was defeated! She was then aprisionated on the demon world and peace was restored.

This tale took place many years ago, but something might be starting to happen in present days...




Discover new and beautiful places, fields, forests, caves, volcanos, mountains and of course Elowyn's house!



Soar through the landscape in your broom! Elowyn might find some new things on the sky!



Elowyn starts as an apprentice, but she can grow and improve her abilities! She is not limited by numbers, improve and learn together with Elowyn!



Unleash advanced spells! Advanced Spells can deal enourmous amount of damage, but you have to know when and where to use them!
